00020 #include <sys/time.h>
00021 #include <cmath>
00022 #include <gsl/gsl_rng.h>
00023 #include <gsl/gsl_randist.h>
00024 
00025 #include "stat.h"
00026 
00027 namespace RDK2 { namespace Statistics {
00028 
00029     gsl_rng * r = NULL;
00030 
00031     void initRNG() {
00032         if(r==NULL) {
00033             gsl_rng_env_setup();
00034             r = gsl_rng_alloc (gsl_rng_default);
00035         }
00036     }
00037     
00038     unsigned long int setRandomSeed() {
00039         struct timeval time;
00040         gettimeofday(&time,NULL);
00041         unsigned long int seed = (unsigned long int) time.tv_usec;
00042         setSeed(seed);
00043         return seed;
00044     }
00045     
00046     void setSeed(unsigned long int seed) {
00047         initRNG();
00048         gsl_rng_set(r, seed);
00049     }
00050     
00051     double sampleGaussianSigma(double sigma) {
00052         initRNG();
00053         return gsl_ran_gaussian (r,sigma);
00054     }
00055     
00056     double sampleUniform(double max) {
00057         initRNG();
00058         return max*gsl_rng_uniform (r);
00059     }
00060     
00061     double sampleUniform(double center, double range) {
00062         initRNG();
00063         return (2*range)*gsl_rng_uniform (r)+center-range;
00064     }
00065         
00066     double gaussian(double x, double mean, double sigma){
00067         return (1./sqrt(2.*M_PI*sigma*sigma))*exp(-((x-mean)*(x-mean))/(2*sigma*sigma));
00068     }
00069 
00070 }}
